notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.K. integrated the available data into the PD molecular landscape. C.K., G.M., J.V., and G.P. were involved in designing the study. C.K., G.M., O.I., T.G., J.V., G.P. have contributed to the interpretation of the results. M.S. and T.G. have provided the summary statistics GWAS data for the polygenic risk score analysis that was performed by M.M. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
